content:
Sam van Gool (based at IRIF in Paris) has advertised a 12-month post-doctoral position in topology, algebra, categories and logic as part of the French ANR-funded project "TopTT : Topology for Types and Terms", which may be of interest to people here.

I am not personally involved in the ANR project, but have been interacting a lot with Sam recently through the Categories for Automata and Language working group at IRIF, and think that he would be a great person to work with during a (alas, short) postdoc. The application deadline is 17 May.
